Mobile Phones With 6 GB & Above RAM

This list contains 2761 Mobile Phones With 6 GB & Above RAM in India. This price list was last updated on Jul 06, 2023.

Top 3 Mobile Phones With 6 GB & Above RAM are as follows:
  1. OPPO Reno 10 Pro: 4G, 50 MP + 32 MP + 8 MP Triple Rear & 32 MP Front Camera, 3G, NFC, No FM Radio
  2. OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite 5G: 8 GB RAM, Octa Core, 2.2 GHz Processor, Memory Card (Hybrid), Dual Sim
  3. Vivo T2x 5G (6GB RAM + 128GB): 5000 mAh Battery with 18W Fast Charging, Dimensity 6020, 4G, 5G, 50 MP + 2 MP Dual Rear & 8 MP Front Camera
